response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs and expectations. This product holds immense value for you, just like it does for us. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 950000}
